com.felix.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.felix.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some methods around file management.

    felix

        Returns:

      • createDir

        public static boolean createDir(java.lang.String path)
        Given a path string create all the directories in the path. For example, if the path string is "java/applet", the method will create directory "java" and then "java/applet" if they don't exist. The file separator string "/" is platform dependent system property.
        Parameters:
        path - Directory path string.
        Returns:
        true if creation success, otherwise false

        Parameters:
        fileName - filename to check if it's a directory
        Returns:
        true or false

        Get the extension of a file, without the ".". Must contain non-numeric characters
        Parameters:
        f - the file you want to get the extension from
        Returns:
        the extension of the file or null, if none was there.
